Document.Focus: Paint, lacquer, and varnish remover poisoning

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Paint, lacquer, and varnish remover poisoning
QAPair.Answer: This article discusses the harmful effects from swallowing or breathing in (sniffing) products to remove paint, lacquer , or varnish . This article is for information only. DO NOT use it to treat or manage an actual poison exposure. If you or someone you are with has an exposure, call the local emergency number (such as 911), or the local poison control center can be reached directly by calling the national toll-free Poison Help hotline (1-800-222-1222) from anywhere in the United States.
